product_name: Julbo Trek Zebra Glacier Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: From intense glare to low light and from basecamp to the summit, these Julbo Trek Zebra sunglasses with photochromic lenses are built for on the glacier protection in any condition. Zebra(R) photochromic NXT lenses respond quickly to changing light conditions, darken in bright light and lighten in dim light. NXT polyurethane lens material provides exceptional optical clarity and visual comfort. Extremely flexible and impact-resistant, NXT lenses are guaranteed not to break or crack. NXT lenses feature a long-lasting antifog coating that stops condensation from forming on lens surfaces. Lightweight, tough nylon frames feature flexible temples that allow sunglasses to fit various face shapes naturally. Adjustable, shockproof nose pads and temples become tacky as you perspire, reducing slippage. Side shields block light coming from the sides; can be removed as needed. Julbo Trek Zebra sunglasses include a protective case for storage.
short_description: From intense glare to low light and from basecamp to the summit, these Julbo Trek Zebra sunglasses with photochromic lenses are built for on the glacier protection in any condition.
